import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { SubjectService } from 'src/app/subject/service/subject.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-subject-list', templateUrl: './subject-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./subject-list.component.scss'] }) export class SubjectListComponent implements OnInit { subjectList:any = ''; name:string = ''; id:number = 0; constructor(private SubjectService: SubjectService){} ngOnInit() { this.SubjectService.getListSubject().subscribe(res => { this.subjectList = res; console.log(res); }) } create(name:string){ this.SubjectService.createSubject(name).subscribe(res => { this.SubjectService.getListSubject() console.log(res); }) } handleFilter(id:number) }
